attributes.action: Ban the MOBO (music of black origin) Awards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is very offensive and racist towards all the "non-black" people in England. If there was for example, a 'Music of White origin' award show, it would not be allowed, people would be protesting and it would be deemed racist. So why is the MOBO's allowed? We want equality.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
